SMART WHO HIV Implmementation Guide
0.1.0 - ci-build

  • HIV.D CodeSystem

SMART WHO HIV Implmementation Guide - Local Development build (v0.1.0) built by the FHIR (HL7® FHIR® Standard) Build Tools. See the Directory of published versions

: HIV.D CodeSystem - XML Representation

Draft as of 2024-05-28

Raw xml | Download



<CodeSystem xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="HIV.D"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>This case-insensitive code system <code>http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/smart-hiv/CodeSystem/HIV.D</code> defines the following codes:</p><table class="codes"><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap"><b>Code</b></td><td><b>Display</b></td><td><b>Definition</b></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1<a name="HIV.D-DE1"> </a></td><td>Reason for visit</td><td><div><p>Whether visit was scheduled or unscheduled, clinical only, or for ARV drug pick-up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE2<a name="HIV.D-DE2"> </a></td><td>First clinical visit</td><td><div><p>The client's first appointment for clinical care by a provider at the facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE3<a name="HIV.D-DE3"> </a></td><td>Clinical visit</td><td><div><p>Appointment for clinical care by a provider</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE4<a name="HIV.D-DE4"> </a></td><td>ART initiation</td><td><div><p>Appointment for initiation of ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE5<a name="HIV.D-DE5"> </a></td><td>ART drug pick up</td><td><div><p>Appointment for an antiretroviral drug pick up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE6<a name="HIV.D-DE6"> </a></td><td>Issues and concerns</td><td><div><p>Visit to address issues and concerns</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE7<a name="HIV.D-DE7"> </a></td><td>Post-treatment follow-up visit for cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer</td><td><div><p>Appointment for a post-treatment follow-up visit for cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE8<a name="HIV.D-DE8"> </a></td><td>Scheduled visit</td><td><div><p>Is this is a scheduled visit?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE9<a name="HIV.D-DE9"> </a></td><td>Body temperature</td><td><div><p>Temperature of the client in Celsius</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE10<a name="HIV.D-DE10"> </a></td><td>Respiratory rate</td><td><div><p>The number of breaths per minute</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE11<a name="HIV.D-DE11"> </a></td><td>Heart rate</td><td><div><p>The number of heartbeats per minute</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE12<a name="HIV.D-DE12"> </a></td><td>Body height</td><td><div><p>The client's height in centimetres</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE13<a name="HIV.D-DE13"> </a></td><td>Body weight</td><td><div><p>The client's current weight in kilograms</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE14<a name="HIV.D-DE14"> </a></td><td>Systolic blood pressure</td><td><div><p>Systolic blood pressure (SBP) in mmHg</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE15<a name="HIV.D-DE15"> </a></td><td>Diastolic blood pressure</td><td><div><p>Diastolic blood pressure (DBP) in mmHg</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE16<a name="HIV.D-DE16"> </a></td><td>Blood pressure cannot be taken</td><td><div><p>If the client's blood pressure cannot be taken, this should be indicated here. Otherwise, blood pressure should be measured.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE17<a name="HIV.D-DE17"> </a></td><td>Signs of serious illness</td><td><div><p>Signs that may indicate the client has a serious illness and needs triage or an emergency referral</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE18<a name="HIV.D-DE18"> </a></td><td>Fever of 39 C or greater</td><td><div><p>Client has a fever with a measured temperature of 102.2 F/39 C or greater</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE19<a name="HIV.D-DE19"> </a></td><td>Tachycardia</td><td><div><p>Heart rate above a rate per minute based on age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE20<a name="HIV.D-DE20"> </a></td><td>Tachypnea</td><td><div><p>Respiratory rate above a number of breaths per minute based on age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE21<a name="HIV.D-DE21"> </a></td><td>Unable to walk unaided</td><td><div><p>Client is not able to walk without help</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE22<a name="HIV.D-DE22"> </a></td><td>Lethargy</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting lethargy as a sign of serious illness</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE23<a name="HIV.D-DE23"> </a></td><td>Unconsciousness</td><td><div><p>Client is currently unconscious</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE24<a name="HIV.D-DE24"> </a></td><td>Convulsions</td><td><div><p>Client is convulsing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE25<a name="HIV.D-DE25"> </a></td><td>Unable to drink</td><td><div><p>Child is not able to drink</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE26<a name="HIV.D-DE26"> </a></td><td>Unable to breastfeed</td><td><div><p>Infant or child is not able to breastfeed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE27<a name="HIV.D-DE27"> </a></td><td>Repeated vomiting</td><td><div><p>Client is repeatedly vomiting</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE28<a name="HIV.D-DE28"> </a></td><td>Headache</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting a headache</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE29<a name="HIV.D-DE29"> </a></td><td>Other sign of serious illness</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting another sign of a serious illness</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE30<a name="HIV.D-DE30"> </a></td><td>Other sign of serious illness (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting another sign of a serious illness (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE31<a name="HIV.D-DE31"> </a></td><td>Currently pregnant</td><td><div><p>Client is currently pregnant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE32<a name="HIV.D-DE32"> </a></td><td>Breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>Client is giving infant breast milk</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE33<a name="HIV.D-DE33"> </a></td><td>Number of pregnancies (gravida)</td><td><div><p>Total number of times the woman has been pregnant (gravida)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE34<a name="HIV.D-DE34"> </a></td><td>Number of miscarriages and/or abortions</td><td><div><p>Total number of pregnancies lost/ended due to miscarriages and/or abortions before 22 weeks/5 months</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE35<a name="HIV.D-DE35"> </a></td><td>Number of live births</td><td><div><p>Total number of live births after 22 weeks</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE36<a name="HIV.D-DE36"> </a></td><td>Parity</td><td><div><p>Calculated parity is the total number of live and stillbirths</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE37<a name="HIV.D-DE37"> </a></td><td>Serodiscordant partner</td><td><div><p>Client's HIV status is different from a current partner's HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE38<a name="HIV.D-DE38"> </a></td><td>On ART</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE39<a name="HIV.D-DE39"> </a></td><td>ART start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client started or restarted ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE40<a name="HIV.D-DE40"> </a></td><td>Stopped ART</td><td><div><p>Client stopped taking ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE41<a name="HIV.D-DE41"> </a></td><td>Date ART stopped</td><td><div><p>Date on which client stopped ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE42<a name="HIV.D-DE42"> </a></td><td>Established on ART</td><td><div><p>Is the client successfully established on ART?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE43<a name="HIV.D-DE43"> </a></td><td>ART start type</td><td><div><p>Whether the client is ART naive or is restarting ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE44<a name="HIV.D-DE44"> </a></td><td>First-time user of ART</td><td><div><p>Client is ART naive, having never taken ART to treat HIV before</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE45<a name="HIV.D-DE45"> </a></td><td>Restarting ART</td><td><div><p>Client is restarting ART after stopping treatment for any reason</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE46<a name="HIV.D-DE46"> </a></td><td>Date of initiation on ART</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client was first initiated on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE47<a name="HIV.D-DE47"> </a></td><td>Time on ART</td><td><div><p>Time the client has been on ART since starting or restarting it in years and months</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE48<a name="HIV.D-DE48"> </a></td><td>Date(s) ART restarted</td><td><div><p>Date(s) client restarted ART after stopping (intentionally interrupting) for any number of reasons (see &quot;Reason ART stopped&quot;)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE49<a name="HIV.D-DE49"> </a></td><td>ART cohort</td><td><div><p>Month and year client originally started ART (documented) at a health facility in the system. The cohort is a group of patients who started ART in the same month (or quarter) and year, whose status is followed over time, using the ART register.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE50<a name="HIV.D-DE50"> </a></td><td>Transfer in for HIV care</td><td><div><p>Client is transferring in with records or known ART drugs and ART start date</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE51<a name="HIV.D-DE51"> </a></td><td>Date of transfer in</td><td><div><p>Date client presented at facility (with transfer/referral slip) from another facility (and on ART) within the system</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE52<a name="HIV.D-DE52"> </a></td><td>Facility transferred from</td><td><div><p>Name of health facility client was transferred from</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE53<a name="HIV.D-DE53"> </a></td><td>Date enrolled in HIV care</td><td><div><p>Date client first enrols in HIV care at the facility. Begins when a person with a confirmed HIV diagnosis presents to a facility where HIV care is provided and a medical record, patient card, file or chart is opened for the first time. This could be at an HIV care/ART, MNCH or TB clinic.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE54<a name="HIV.D-DE54"> </a></td><td>Age at enrolment</td><td><div><p>Client's age when the client was enrolled in ART care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE55<a name="HIV.D-DE55"> </a></td><td>Facility where client first enrolled in HIV care</td><td><div><p>Facility where the client first enrolled in HIV care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE56<a name="HIV.D-DE56"> </a></td><td>Antiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>Whether or not the client received ARV drugs prior to enrolling into HIV care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE57<a name="HIV.D-DE57"> </a></td><td>No prior ARVs</td><td><div><p>Client received no prior ARVs</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE58<a name="HIV.D-DE58"> </a></td><td>Received ARVs prior without records/documentation</td><td><div><p>Client received ARVs prior without records/documentation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE59<a name="HIV.D-DE59"> </a></td><td>Received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>Client received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE60<a name="HIV.D-DE60"> </a></td><td>Received ARVs for PEP or PrEP</td><td><div><p>Client received ARVs for post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) or PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE61<a name="HIV.D-DE61"> </a></td><td>ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant</td><td><div><p>Client received ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE62<a name="HIV.D-DE62"> </a></td><td>Date ARV drugs received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>Date ARV drugs were started prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE63<a name="HIV.D-DE63"> </a></td><td>Location ARV drugs received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>Health facility (or other location) where ARV drugs were received prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE64<a name="HIV.D-DE64"> </a></td><td>ARV drug regimen received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>ARV drug regimen received prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE65<a name="HIV.D-DE65"> </a></td><td>Existing chronic health conditions</td><td><div><p>Does the client have any current chronic health conditions or problems?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE66<a name="HIV.D-DE66"> </a></td><td>No chronic or past health conditions</td><td><div><p>Client does not have chronic diseases or any past health conditions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE67<a name="HIV.D-DE67"> </a></td><td>Don't know</td><td><div><p>Client does not know whether she has any chronic diseases or past health conditions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE68<a name="HIV.D-DE68"> </a></td><td>Diabetes other or unspecified</td><td><div><p>Client has diabetes of other or unspecified type</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE69<a name="HIV.D-DE69"> </a></td><td>Diabetes pre-existing type 1</td><td><div><p>Client has pre-existing type 1 diabetes mellitus</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE70<a name="HIV.D-DE70"> </a></td><td>Diabetes pre-existing type 2</td><td><div><p>Client has pre-existing type 2 diabetes mellitus</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE71<a name="HIV.D-DE71"> </a></td><td>Hypertension</td><td><div><p>High blood pressure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE72<a name="HIV.D-DE72"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Other health conditions not included in the list</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE73<a name="HIV.D-DE73"> </a></td><td>Other (specify)</td><td><div><p>Other health conditions not included in the list (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE74<a name="HIV.D-DE74"> </a></td><td>Original first-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>Original full, first-line ARV drug regimen patient started on at this facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE75<a name="HIV.D-DE75"> </a></td><td>Current ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The current ART regimen the client is taking</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE76<a name="HIV.D-DE76"> </a></td><td>Current ART regimen start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client started taking the current ART regimen</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE77<a name="HIV.D-DE77"> </a></td><td>Preferred first-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The preferred first-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE78<a name="HIV.D-DE78"> </a></td><td>Alternative first-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The alternative first-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE79<a name="HIV.D-DE79"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen under special circumstances</td><td><div><p>The first-line ART regimen for the client under special circumstances according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE80<a name="HIV.D-DE80"> </a></td><td>Preferred second-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The preferred second-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE81<a name="HIV.D-DE81"> </a></td><td>Alternative second-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The alternative second-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE82<a name="HIV.D-DE82"> </a></td><td>Optimal regimen for transition</td><td><div><p>The optimal regimen for transition to DTG-based regimens for children established on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE83<a name="HIV.D-DE83"> </a></td><td>Current ART regimen (first-, second-, or third-line)</td><td><div><p>ART regimen for treating clients living with HIV, based on national guidance</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE84<a name="HIV.D-DE84"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents</td><td><div><p>First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE85<a name="HIV.D-DE85"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen for children</td><td><div><p>First-line ART regimen for children living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE86<a name="HIV.D-DE86"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen for neonates</td><td><div><p>First-line ART regimen for neonates living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE87<a name="HIV.D-DE87"> </a></td><td>Second-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents</td><td><div><p>Second-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE88<a name="HIV.D-DE88"> </a></td><td>Second-line ART regimen for children</td><td><div><p>Second-line ART regimen for children living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE89<a name="HIV.D-DE89"> </a></td><td>Third-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>Third-line ART regimen for people living with HIV (Not defined by WHO. National programmes should develop policies for third-line ART)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE90<a name="HIV.D-DE90"> </a></td><td>ART regimen</td><td><div><p>List of ART regimens</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE91<a name="HIV.D-DE91"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + ATV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and atazanavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE92<a name="HIV.D-DE92"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + DTG</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and dolutegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE93<a name="HIV.D-DE93"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + EFV</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and efavarinez</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE94<a name="HIV.D-DE94"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + LPV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and lopinavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE95<a name="HIV.D-DE95"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + NVP</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and nevirapine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE96<a name="HIV.D-DE96"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + RAL</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and raltegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE97<a name="HIV.D-DE97"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + ATV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and atazanavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE98<a name="HIV.D-DE98"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + DRV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and darunavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE99<a name="HIV.D-DE99"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + DTG</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and dolutegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE100<a name="HIV.D-DE100"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + EFV</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and efavirenz</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE101<a name="HIV.D-DE101"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + EFV 600 mg</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and efavirenz 600 mg</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE102<a name="HIV.D-DE102"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + LPV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and lopinavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE103<a name="HIV.D-DE103"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + NVP</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and nevirapine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE104<a name="HIV.D-DE104"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + RAL</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and raltegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE105<a name="HIV.D-DE105"> </a></td><td>TAF + 3TC + DTG</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing tenofovir alafenamide, lamivudine, and dolutegravir</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE215<a name="HIV.D-DE215"> </a></td><td>Other reason for nonadherence</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of other reason for nonadherence</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE224<a name="HIV.D-DE224"> </a></td><td>Other reason for stopping ART (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because of other reason (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE225<a name="HIV.D-DE225"> </a></td><td>Treatment failure</td><td><div><p>ART treatment failure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE226<a name="HIV.D-DE226"> </a></td><td>Clinical failure</td><td><div><p>New or recurrent clinical event indicating severe immunodeficiency in adults or advanced or severe immunodeficiency in children</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE227<a name="HIV.D-DE227"> </a></td><td>Immunological failure</td><td><div><p>CD4 count at or below 250 cells/mm3 following clinical failure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE228<a name="HIV.D-DE228"> </a></td><td>Virological failure</td><td><div><p>The inability to achieve or maintain viral suppression below a certain threshold indicated by viral load above 1000 copies/mL based on two consecutive viral load measurements in 3 months, with adherence support following the first viral load test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE229<a name="HIV.D-DE229"> </a></td><td>General care activities recommended</td><td><div><p>General care activities to be performed during the care visit</p>

For children younger than five years of age: stunting is defined as severe acute malnutrition - either weight for height &lt; -3 z-score or mid-upper arm circumference &lt;115 mm or the presence of oedema.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE307<a name="HIV.D-DE307"> </a></td><td>Unexplained chronic diarrhoea for longer than 1 month</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained chronic diarrhoea for longer than 1 month</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE308<a name="HIV.D-DE308"> </a></td><td>Unexplained persistent diarrhoea (14 days or more)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained persistent diarrhoea (14 days or more)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE310<a name="HIV.D-DE310"> </a></td><td>Persistent oral candidiasis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include persistent oral candidiasis</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE315<a name="HIV.D-DE315"> </a></td><td>Severe recurrent bacterial pneumonia</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include severe recurrent bacterial pneumonia</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE318<a name="HIV.D-DE318"> </a></td><td>Acute necrotizing ulcerative periodontitis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include acute necrotizing ulcerative periodontitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE319<a name="HIV.D-DE319"> </a></td><td>Unexplained anaemia (&lt;8 g/dL)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained anaemia (&lt;8 g/dL)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE321<a name="HIV.D-DE321"> </a></td><td>Chronic thrombocytopaenia (&lt;50 x 10^9/L)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include chronic thrombocytopaenia (&lt;50 x 10^9/L)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE322<a name="HIV.D-DE322"> </a></td><td>Symptomatic lymphoid interstitial pneumonitis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include symptomatic lymphoid interstitial pneumonitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE323<a name="HIV.D-DE323"> </a></td><td>Chronic HIV-associated lung disease, including bronchiectasis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include chronic HIV-associated lung disease, including bronchiectasis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE324<a name="HIV.D-DE324"> </a></td><td>HIV wasting syndrome</td><td><div><p>Unexplained involuntary weight loss (&gt;10% baseline body weight), with obvious wasting or body mass index &lt;18.5; PLUS EITHER unexplained chronic reported for longer than one month; OR reports of fever or night sweats for more than one month without other cause and lack of response to antibiotics or antimalarial agents; malaria must be excluded in malarious areas.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE325<a name="HIV.D-DE325"> </a></td><td>Unexplained severe wasting not responding to standard therapy</td><td><div><p>Client has unexplained severe wasting not responding to standard therapy . For under 5 years old, defined as weight-for-height &lt; -3 z-score</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE432<a name="HIV.D-DE432"> </a></td><td>Immunological failure</td><td><div><p>A switch was made to the regimen because of immunological failure</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE457<a name="HIV.D-DE457"> </a></td><td>Medications prescribed</td><td><div><p>Name or regimen code of all other medications prescribed during the visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE458<a name="HIV.D-DE458"> </a></td><td>Date medications prescribed</td><td><div><p>Date the medications were prescribed</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE461<a name="HIV.D-DE461"> </a></td><td>Medications dispensed</td><td><div><p>Any other medications that were dispensed to client, including preventive treatment</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE464<a name="HIV.D-DE464"> </a></td><td>Frequency</td><td><div><p>Prescribed frequency for taking the medication</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE465<a name="HIV.D-DE465"> </a></td><td>Adherence counselling provided</td><td><div><p>Counselling was carried out during visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE466<a name="HIV.D-DE466"> </a></td><td>Type of treatment-limiting toxicity</td><td><div><p>Type of treatment-limiting toxicity experienced by client. Treatment-limiting toxicity is defined as a serious adverse drug reaction that results in drug discontinuation or substitution. In addition, any reaction that leads to treatment interruption or requires changing the drug or regimen because of an adverse drug reaction is also considered a serious adverse drug reaction.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE467<a name="HIV.D-DE467"> </a></td><td>Gastrointestinal</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to GI issues (nausea, diarrhoea, abdominal pain, vomiting)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE468<a name="HIV.D-DE468"> </a></td><td>Skin issues</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to skin issues (rash, hypersensitivity reaction)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE469<a name="HIV.D-DE469"> </a></td><td>Peripheral neuropathy</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to peripheral neuropathy (burning/numbness/ tingling)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE470<a name="HIV.D-DE470"> </a></td><td>Central nervous system symptoms</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to central nervous system symptoms (dizzy, anxiety, nightmare, depression, seizures)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE471<a name="HIV.D-DE471"> </a></td><td>Weight gain</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to weight gain</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE472<a name="HIV.D-DE472"> </a></td><td>Hepatic dysfunction</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to hepatic dysfunction (jaundice)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE473<a name="HIV.D-DE473"> </a></td><td>Haematological disorders</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to haematological (anaemia, neutropenia) disorders</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE474<a name="HIV.D-DE474"> </a></td><td>Fatigue</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to fatigue</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE475<a name="HIV.D-DE475"> </a></td><td>Headache</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to headache</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE476<a name="HIV.D-DE476"> </a></td><td>Bone dysfunction</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to bone dysfunction (fractures, osteopenia)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE477<a name="HIV.D-DE477"> </a></td><td>Metabolic symptoms</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to metabolic symptoms (body fat changes, hyperglycaemia, dyslipidaemia)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE478<a name="HIV.D-DE478"> </a></td><td>Kidney dysfunction</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to kidney dysfunction (nephrolithiasis, renal insufficiency)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE939<a name="HIV.D-DE939"> </a></td><td>TB diagnosis result</td><td><div><p>Final result of the TB investigation (bacteriological and/or clinical)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE940<a name="HIV.D-DE940"> </a></td><td>Diagnosed TB</td><td><div><p>Client is diagnosed with TB disease</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE941<a name="HIV.D-DE941"> </a></td><td>TB excluded</td><td><div><p>Client is not diagnosed with TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE942<a name="HIV.D-DE942"> </a></td><td>Method of TB diagnosis</td><td><div><p>Method used to set the TB diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE943<a name="HIV.D-DE943"> </a></td><td>Bacteriologically confirmed</td><td><div><p>A person from whom a biological specimen is positive by smear microscopy, culture or a WHO-recommended rapid diagnostic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE944<a name="HIV.D-DE944"> </a></td><td>Clinically diagnosed</td><td><div><p>A person who does not fulfil the criteria for bacteriological confirmation but has been diagnosed with TB disease by a medical practitioner who has decided to give the person a full course of TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE945<a name="HIV.D-DE945"> </a></td><td>Presumptive TB</td><td><div><p>Client has signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) without laboratory confirmation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE946<a name="HIV.D-DE946"> </a></td><td>Presumptive TB registration date</td><td><div><p>Date client is registered as having signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) without laboratory confirmation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE947<a name="HIV.D-DE947"> </a></td><td>TB treatment history</td><td><div><p>History of previous TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE948<a name="HIV.D-DE948"> </a></td><td>New</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who has never been treated for TB before or has only previously ever taken TB drugs for less than 1 month</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE949<a name="HIV.D-DE949"> </a></td><td>Recurrent</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who was previously treated for TB, was declared cured or treatment completed at the end of their most recent course of TB treatment and is now diagnosed with a new episode of TB.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE950<a name="HIV.D-DE950"> </a></td><td>Re-registered</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who had been notified previously as a TB case, but was not declared cured or treatment completed, and is now being registered for a new course of TB treatment.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE951<a name="HIV.D-DE951"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who has undocumented history of TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE952<a name="HIV.D-DE952"> </a></td><td>Date of TB diagnosis</td><td><div><p>The date when the diagnosis was established</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE953<a name="HIV.D-DE953"> </a></td><td>Currently on TB preventive treatment (TPT)</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking TPT</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE968<a name="HIV.D-DE968"> </a></td><td>Screening with mWRD</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB with a molecular WHO-recommended rapid diagnostic test (mWRD), such as an Xpert MTB/RIF test to detect Mycobacterium tuberculosis (MTB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE969<a name="HIV.D-DE969"> </a></td><td>Clinical assessment</td><td><div><p>Client screened for with a clinical evaluation for tuberculosis (TB) based on national guidelines. </div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE976<a name="HIV.D-DE976"> </a></td><td>Fever of 39 °C or greater</td><td><div><p>Client has a fever with a measured temperature of 102.2 °F/39 °C or greater</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE977<a name="HIV.D-DE977"> </a></td><td>Weight loss (reported)</td><td><div><p>Unexplained weight loss</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE978<a name="HIV.D-DE978"> </a></td><td>Night sweats</td><td><div><p>Client reports experiencing night sweats</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE979<a name="HIV.D-DE979"> </a></td><td>Poor weight gain</td><td><div><p>Client reports poor weight gain of child or infant or growth curve flattening or weight for age &lt;-2 Z-scores.</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE999<a name="HIV.D-DE999"> </a></td><td>TB diagnostic test result date</td><td><div><p>The date when the result of the TB diagnostic test is available</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1000<a name="HIV.D-DE1000"> </a></td><td>TB treatment started</td><td><div><p>Indicates if TB treatment was started</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1001<a name="HIV.D-DE1001"> </a></td><td>TB treatment start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client start or restarted tuberculosis (TB) treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1002<a name="HIV.D-DE1002"> </a></td><td>TB treatment outcome</td><td><div><p>Indicates patient's TB treatment outcome</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1003<a name="HIV.D-DE1003"> </a></td><td>Treatment failed</td><td><div><p>The treatment regimen terminated or permanently changed to a new regimen or treatment strategy. Reasons for the change include:</p>
<ul>
<li>no clinical response or no bacteriological response, or both (see note;</li>
<li>adverse drug reaction; or</li>
<li>evidence of additional drug-resistance to medicines in the regimen.</li>
</ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1004<a name="HIV.D-DE1004"> </a></td><td>Cured</td><td><div><p>Client with pulmonary TB with bacteriologically confirmed TB at the beginning of treatment who completed treatment as recommended by the national policy, with evidence of bacteriological response and no evidence of failure.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1005<a name="HIV.D-DE1005"> </a></td><td>Treatment completed</td><td><div><p>Patient completed treatment as recommended by the national policy but the outcome does not meet the definition for cure or treatment failure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1006<a name="HIV.D-DE1006"> </a></td><td>Died</td><td><div><p>Client died before starting treatment or during the course of treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1007<a name="HIV.D-DE1007"> </a></td><td>Lost to follow-up</td><td><div><p>Client was lost to follow-up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1008<a name="HIV.D-DE1008"> </a></td><td>Not evaluated</td><td><div><p>No treatment outcome was assigned. This includes cases 'transferred out' to another treatment unit and whose treatment outcome is unknown; however, it excludes those lost to follow-up.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1009<a name="HIV.D-DE1009"> </a></td><td>TB treatment completion date</td><td><div><p>Date client completes TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1010<a name="HIV.D-DE1010"> </a></td><td>TB treatment regimen composition</td><td><div><p>TB drugs currently being taken by the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1011<a name="HIV.D-DE1011"> </a></td><td>Isoniazid</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking isoniazid</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1012<a name="HIV.D-DE1012"> </a></td><td>Rifampicin</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking rifampicin</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1013<a name="HIV.D-DE1013"> </a></td><td>Rifabutin</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking rifabutin</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1014<a name="HIV.D-DE1014"> </a></td><td>Ethambutol</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking ethambutol</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1015<a name="HIV.D-DE1015"> </a></td><td>Levofloxacin</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking levofloxacin</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1016<a name="HIV.D-DE1016"> </a></td><td>Pyrazinamide</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking pyrazinamide, a first-line anti-tuberculosis drug</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1017<a name="HIV.D-DE1017"> </a></td><td>Eligible for TB preventive treatment</td><td><div><p>Client is eligible for tuberculosis preventive treatment (TPT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1018<a name="HIV.D-DE1018"> </a></td><td>Date when eligibility for TB preventive treatment (TPT) was determined</td><td><div><p>Date when a determination of the client's eligibility for TPT was made</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1019<a name="HIV.D-DE1019"> </a></td><td>TB status at ART start</td><td><div><p>Client's tuberculosis (TB) status when antiretroviral therapy (ART) is started</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1020<a name="HIV.D-DE1020"> </a></td><td>Symptomatic for TB</td><td><div><p>Signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) without laboratory confirmation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1021<a name="HIV.D-DE1021"> </a></td><td>Diagnosed TB</td><td><div><p>Laboratory confirmed tuberculosis (TB) diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1022<a name="HIV.D-DE1022"> </a></td><td>None</td><td><div><p>Client has no signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) and is not diagnosed with tuberculosis (TB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1023<a name="HIV.D-DE1023"> </a></td><td>TB prevention services accepted</td><td><div><p>Indicates if the client accepts to be evaluated for TB infection and to take the treatment in case he/she is eligible</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1024<a name="HIV.D-DE1024"> </a></td><td>TB meningitis</td><td><div><p>Type of extrapulmonary TB identified for the client is TB meningitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1025<a name="HIV.D-DE1025"> </a></td><td>C reactive protein test date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client has a test for C reactive protein</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1026<a name="HIV.D-DE1026"> </a></td><td>C reactive protein test result</td><td><div><p>Test result of the client's C reactive protein test result in mg/L</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1027<a name="HIV.D-DE1027"> </a></td><td>C reactive protein test result date</td><td><div><p>The date when the client's test result for C reactive protein is available</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1028<a name="HIV.D-DE1028"> </a></td><td>TPT regimen type</td><td><div><p>Type of TPT regimen the client is currently on</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1029<a name="HIV.D-DE1029"> </a></td><td>3HP</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is 3HP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1030<a name="HIV.D-DE1030"> </a></td><td>1HP</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is 1HP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1031<a name="HIV.D-DE1031"> </a></td><td>6H</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is 6H</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1032<a name="HIV.D-DE1032"> </a></td><td>Six months of levofloxacin daily</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is six months of levofloxacin daily</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1033<a name="HIV.D-DE1033"> </a></td><td>Other TB preventive treatment (TPT) regimen</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is another regimen than those listed above</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1034<a name="HIV.D-DE1034"> </a></td><td>TB preventive treatment (TPT) status</td><td><div><p>Indicates the current status of TB preventive treatment (TPT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1035<a name="HIV.D-DE1035"> </a></td><td>Not started</td><td><div><p>The client did not start the TB preventive treatment (TPT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1036<a name="HIV.D-DE1036"> </a></td><td>On TPT</td><td><div><p>The client started the TB preventive treatment (TPT) and is currently taking the medication, without treatment interruptions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1037<a name="HIV.D-DE1037"> </a></td><td>On TPT with interruptions</td><td><div><p>The client started the TB preventive treatment (TPT) and is currently taking the medication, with treatment interruptions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1038<a name="HIV.D-DE1038"> </a></td><td>On hold</td><td><div><p>The health care worker has temporarily stopped the TB preventive treatment (TPT), but TPT is expected to continue again later. May also be called &quot;suspended&quot;.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">DE1039<a name="HIV.D-DE1039"> </a></td><td>Completed</td><td><div><p>TB preventive treatment (TPT) was completed</p>
</div></td></tr></table></div>
  </text>

       value="http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/smart-hiv/CodeSystem/HIV.D"/>

  <status value="draft"/>
  <experimental value="false"/>
  <date value="2024-05-28T19:00:34+00:00"/>
  <publisher value="WHO"/>
  <contact>
    <name value="WHO"/>

      <system value="url"/>

    </telecom>
  </contact>
  <description value="CodeSystem for HIV.D Data Elements"/>
  <caseSensitive value="false"/>
  <content value="complete"/>
  <count value="1039"/>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE1"/>
    <display value="Reason for visit"/>
    <definition
                value="Whether visit was scheduled or unscheduled, clinical only, or for ARV drug pick-up"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE2"/>
    <display value="First clinical visit"/>
    <definition
                value="The client's first appointment for clinical care by a provider at the facility"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE3"/>
    <display value="Clinical visit"/>
    <definition value="Appointment for clinical care by a provider"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE4"/>
    <display value="ART initiation"/>
    <definition value="Appointment for initiation of ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE5"/>
    <display value="ART drug pick up"/>
    <definition value="Appointment for an antiretroviral drug pick up"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE6"/>
    <display value="Issues and concerns"/>
    <definition value="Visit to address issues and concerns"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE7"/>
    <display
             value="Post-treatment follow-up visit for cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer"/>
    <definition
                value="Appointment for a post-treatment follow-up visit for cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE8"/>
    <display value="Scheduled visit"/>
    <definition value="Is this is a scheduled visit?"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE9"/>
    <display value="Body temperature"/>
    <definition value="Temperature of the client in Celsius"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE10"/>
    <display value="Respiratory rate"/>
    <definition value="The number of breaths per minute"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE11"/>
    <display value="Heart rate"/>
    <definition value="The number of heartbeats per minute"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE12"/>
    <display value="Body height"/>
    <definition value="The client's height in centimetres"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE13"/>
    <display value="Body weight"/>
    <definition value="The client's current weight in kilograms"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE14"/>
    <display value="Systolic blood pressure"/>
    <definition value="Systolic blood pressure (SBP) in mmHg"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE15"/>
    <display value="Diastolic blood pressure"/>
    <definition value="Diastolic blood pressure (DBP) in mmHg"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE16"/>
    <display value="Blood pressure cannot be taken"/>
    <definition
                value="If the client's blood pressure cannot be taken, this should be indicated here. Otherwise, blood pressure should be measured."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE17"/>
    <display value="Signs of serious illness"/>
    <definition
                value="Signs that may indicate the client has a serious illness and needs triage or an emergency referral"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE18"/>
    <display value="Fever of 39 C or greater"/>
    <definition
                value="Client has a fever with a measured temperature of 102.2 F/39 C or greater"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE19"/>
    <display value="Tachycardia"/>
    <definition value="Heart rate above a rate per minute based on age"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE20"/>
    <display value="Tachypnea"/>
    <definition
                value="Respiratory rate above a number of breaths per minute based on age"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE21"/>
    <display value="Unable to walk unaided"/>
    <definition value="Client is not able to walk without help"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE22"/>
    <display value="Lethargy"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is exhibiting lethargy as a sign of serious illness"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE23"/>
    <display value="Unconsciousness"/>
    <definition value="Client is currently unconscious"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE24"/>
    <display value="Convulsions"/>
    <definition value="Client is convulsing"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE25"/>
    <display value="Unable to drink"/>
    <definition value="Child is not able to drink"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE26"/>
    <display value="Unable to breastfeed"/>
    <definition value="Infant or child is not able to breastfeed"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE27"/>
    <display value="Repeated vomiting"/>
    <definition value="Client is repeatedly vomiting"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE28"/>
    <display value="Headache"/>
    <definition value="Client is exhibiting a headache"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE29"/>
    <display value="Other sign of serious illness"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is exhibiting another sign of a serious illness"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE30"/>
    <display value="Other sign of serious illness (specify)"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is exhibiting another sign of a serious illness (specify)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE31"/>
    <display value="Currently pregnant"/>
    <definition value="Client is currently pregnant"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE32"/>
    <display value="Breastfeeding"/>
    <definition value="Client is giving infant breast milk"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE33"/>
    <display value="Number of pregnancies (gravida)"/>
    <definition
                value="Total number of times the woman has been pregnant (gravida)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE34"/>
    <display value="Number of miscarriages and/or abortions"/>
    <definition
                value="Total number of pregnancies lost/ended due to miscarriages and/or abortions before 22 weeks/5 months"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE35"/>
    <display value="Number of live births"/>
    <definition value="Total number of live births after 22 weeks"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE36"/>
    <display value="Parity"/>
    <definition
                value="Calculated parity is the total number of live and stillbirths"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE37"/>
    <display value="Serodiscordant partner"/>
    <definition
                value="Client's HIV status is different from a current partner's HIV status"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE38"/>
    <display value="On ART"/>
    <definition value="Client is currently taking ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE39"/>
    <display value="ART start date"/>
    <definition
                value="The date on which the client started or restarted ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE40"/>
    <display value="Stopped ART"/>
    <definition value="Client stopped taking ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE41"/>
    <display value="Date ART stopped"/>
    <definition value="Date on which client stopped ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE42"/>
    <display value="Established on ART"/>
    <definition value="Is the client successfully established on ART?"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE43"/>
    <display value="ART start type"/>
    <definition value="Whether the client is ART naive or is restarting ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE44"/>
    <display value="First-time user of ART"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is ART naive, having never taken ART to treat HIV before"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE45"/>
    <display value="Restarting ART"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is restarting ART after stopping treatment for any reason"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE46"/>
    <display value="Date of initiation on ART"/>
    <definition
                value="The date on which the client was first initiated on ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE47"/>
    <display value="Time on ART"/>
    <definition
                value="Time the client has been on ART since starting or restarting it in years and months"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE48"/>
    <display value="Date(s) ART restarted"/>
    <definition
                value="Date(s) client restarted ART after stopping (intentionally interrupting) for any number of reasons (see &quot;Reason ART stopped&quot;)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE49"/>
    <display value="ART cohort"/>
    <definition
                value="Month and year client originally started ART (documented) at a health facility in the system. The cohort is a group of patients who started ART in the same month (or quarter) and year, whose status is followed over time, using the ART register."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE50"/>
    <display value="Transfer in for HIV care"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is transferring in with records or known ART drugs and ART start date"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE51"/>
    <display value="Date of transfer in"/>
    <definition
                value="Date client presented at facility (with transfer/referral slip) from another facility (and on ART) within the system"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE52"/>
    <display value="Facility transferred from"/>
    <definition value="Name of health facility client was transferred from"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE53"/>
    <display value="Date enrolled in HIV care"/>
    <definition
                value="Date client first enrols in HIV care at the facility. Begins when a person with a confirmed HIV diagnosis presents to a facility where HIV care is provided and a medical record, patient card, file or chart is opened for the first time. This could be at an HIV care/ART, MNCH or TB clinic."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE54"/>
    <display value="Age at enrolment"/>
    <definition
                value="Client's age when the client was enrolled in ART care"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE55"/>
    <display value="Facility where client first enrolled in HIV care"/>
    <definition value="Facility where the client first enrolled in HIV care"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE56"/>
    <display value="Antiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment"/>
    <definition
                value="Whether or not the client received ARV drugs prior to enrolling into HIV care"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE57"/>
    <display value="No prior ARVs"/>
    <definition value="Client received no prior ARVs"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE58"/>
    <display value="Received ARVs prior without records/documentation"/>
    <definition
                value="Client received ARVs prior without records/documentation"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE59"/>
    <display value="Received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding"/>
    <definition
                value="Client received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE60"/>
    <display value="Received ARVs for PEP or PrEP"/>
    <definition
                value="Client received ARVs for post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) or PrEP"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE61"/>
    <display value="ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant"/>
    <definition
                value="Client received ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE62"/>
    <display value="Date ARV drugs received prior to enrolment"/>
    <definition
                value="Date ARV drugs were started prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE63"/>
    <display value="Location ARV drugs received prior to enrolment"/>
    <definition
                value="Health facility (or other location) where ARV drugs were received prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE64"/>
    <display value="ARV drug regimen received prior to enrolment"/>
    <definition
                value="ARV drug regimen received prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE65"/>
    <display value="Existing chronic health conditions"/>
    <definition
                value="Does the client have any current chronic health conditions or problems?"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE66"/>
    <display value="No chronic or past health conditions"/>
    <definition
                value="Client does not have chronic diseases or any past health conditions"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE67"/>
    <display value="Don't know"/>
    <definition
                value="Client does not know whether she has any chronic diseases or past health conditions"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE68"/>
    <display value="Diabetes other or unspecified"/>
    <definition value="Client has diabetes of other or unspecified type"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE69"/>
    <display value="Diabetes pre-existing type 1"/>
    <definition value="Client has pre-existing type 1 diabetes mellitus"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE70"/>
    <display value="Diabetes pre-existing type 2"/>
    <definition value="Client has pre-existing type 2 diabetes mellitus"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE71"/>
    <display value="Hypertension"/>
    <definition value="High blood pressure"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE72"/>
    <display value="Other"/>
    <definition value="Other health conditions not included in the list"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE73"/>
    <display value="Other (specify)"/>
    <definition
                value="Other health conditions not included in the list (specify)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE74"/>
    <display value="Original first-line ART regimen"/>
    <definition
                value="Original full, first-line ARV drug regimen patient started on at this facility"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE75"/>
    <display value="Current ART regimen"/>
    <definition value="The current ART regimen the client is taking"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE76"/>
    <display value="Current ART regimen start date"/>
    <definition
                value="The date on which the client started taking the current ART regimen"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE77"/>
    <display value="Preferred first-line ART regimen"/>
    <definition
                value="The preferred first-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE78"/>
    <display value="Alternative first-line ART regimen"/>
    <definition
                value="The alternative first-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE79"/>
    <display value="First-line ART regimen under special circumstances"/>
    <definition
                value="The first-line ART regimen for the client under special circumstances according to WHO (or national) guidelines"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE80"/>
    <display value="Preferred second-line ART regimen"/>
    <definition
                value="The preferred second-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE81"/>
    <display value="Alternative second-line ART regimen"/>
    <definition
                value="The alternative second-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE82"/>
    <display value="Optimal regimen for transition"/>
    <definition
                value="The optimal regimen for transition to DTG-based regimens for children established on ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE83"/>
    <display value="Current ART regimen (first-, second-, or third-line)"/>
    <definition
                value="ART regimen for treating clients living with HIV, based on national guidance"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE84"/>
    <display value="First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents"/>
    <definition
                value="First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents living with HIV"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE85"/>
    <display value="First-line ART regimen for children"/>
    <definition value="First-line ART regimen for children living with HIV"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE86"/>
    <display value="First-line ART regimen for neonates"/>
    <definition value="First-line ART regimen for neonates living with HIV"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE87"/>
    <display value="Second-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents"/>
    <definition
                value="Second-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents living with HIV"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>

    <definition value="Client stopped ART because of other reason (specify)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE225"/>
    <display value="Treatment failure"/>
    <definition value="ART treatment failure"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE226"/>
    <display value="Clinical failure"/>
    <definition
                value="New or recurrent clinical event indicating severe immunodeficiency in adults or advanced or severe immunodeficiency in children"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE227"/>
    <display value="Immunological failure"/>
    <definition
                value="CD4 count at or below 250 cells/mm3 following clinical failure"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE228"/>
    <display value="Virological failure"/>
    <definition
                value="The inability to achieve or maintain viral suppression below a certain threshold indicated by viral load above 1000 copies/mL based on two consecutive viral load measurements in 3 months, with adherence support following the first viral load test"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>

    <display value="Bacteriologically confirmed"/>
    <definition
                value="A person from whom a biological specimen is positive by smear microscopy, culture or a WHO-recommended rapid diagnostic"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE944"/>
    <display value="Clinically diagnosed"/>
    <definition
                value="A person who does not fulfil the criteria for bacteriological confirmation but has been diagnosed with TB disease by a medical practitioner who has decided to give the person a full course of TB treatment"/>
  </concept>

    <code value="DE948"/>
    <display value="New"/>
    <definition
                value="A person with TB disease who has never been treated for TB before or has only previously ever taken TB drugs for less than 1 month"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE949"/>
    <display value="Recurrent"/>
    <definition
                value="A person with TB disease who was previously treated for TB, was declared cured or treatment completed at the end of their most recent course of TB treatment and is now diagnosed with a new episode of TB."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="DE950"/>
    <display value="Re-registered"/>

                value="A person with TB disease who had been notified previously as a TB case, but was not declared cured or treatment completed, and is now being registered for a new course of TB treatment. "/>

    <definition
                value="The treatment regimen terminated or permanently changed to a new regimen or treatment strategy. Reasons for the change include:

- adverse drug reaction; or
- evidence of additional drug-resistance to medicines in the regimen."/>
  </concept>
